login.title: Login page
login.content: Welcome! Please login to your account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.content: Enter your email and we will send you a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.content: Enter the new password and re-enter the password to reset the password

create.title: Create a new account
create.description: Fill out the information to create a new account

twofa.title: 2-FA Settings
twofa.enabledAlready: 2FA is already enabled. You can turn it off at any time. But we do not recommend it.
twofa.notEnable: You have not enabled 2FA. Please set up 2FA to connect to your phone for enhanced security.

link.title: To use two-step security. You need to install the Google Authenticator app on your mobile.

index.title: List of Role Group
index.description: You can search or filter by conditions

create.title: Add new Role Group
create.description: In this screen, you can add a role group

role.title: Decentralize the group of accounts
role.description: Choose the right permissions for the group of accounts.

403.title: You don't have access
403.description: Sorry, You do not have permission to access this page.
403.permissionDetail: This page requires permissions: "{{permission}}" with the value: "{{requirePermission}}". But You have: "{{userPermission}}".

404.title: 404! Page not found
404.content: The page you are visiting may have been removed or is temporarily unavailable. Please return to this page later!
